Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Await feedback from @ITPM-1.
If feedback received from @ITPM-1, address any concerns and revise the report template as needed. If no feedback, spend time to learn some other trending skills.

Prepare a presentation summarizing the key features and benefits of the influenza trend analysis report template for the training session next week. Focus on communicating the value of the report to different audiences.
Prepare the detailed design specification for each visualization for the next training session.
Lunch Break. Enjoy the time to relax.

Document the entire report template development process, including the design decisions, the data sources used, and the statistical analysis techniques employed. This documentation will be used for future reference and maintenance.

Create a user guide for the report template. This guide should provide step-by-step instructions on how to use the template, how to interpret the data visualizations, and how to generate updated reports.
Share the report template, the documentation, and the user guide with @TRAINER-1 for inclusion in the training materials.
Complete all tasks and ensure that all documentation is properly organized. End the work and plan for the coming weekend.
